generated.description: This is an autogenerated partial class definition of 'SpecificActivity'

description*.en: The "Specific Activity" is the number of decays per unit time of a radioactive sample. The SI unit of radioactive activity is the becquerel (Bq), in honor of the scientist Henri Becquerel.

title: SpecificActivity
description: The "Specific Activity" is the number of decays per unit time of a radioactive sample. The SI unit of radioactive activity is the becquerel (Bq), in honor of the scientist Henri Becquerel.
